Package dev.gamekit.ui.events

Class MouseEvent

java.lang.Object
dev.gamekit.ui.events.InputEvent
dev.gamekit.ui.events.MouseEvent
public class MouseEvent extends InputEvent
Abstract base class for mouse related events. Contains an (x, y) for the screen location the event took place.
